task.title: Toast with Refried Beans and Avacado
task.shortdesc: A delcious vegan recipe that only takes five minutes of your time

taskbody.context:
The only tools this recipe requires is toaster and normal silverwear, such as a fork and knife
Ingredients
2 slices sandwich bread
1 cup homemade or store-bought vegan refried beans
1 avocado, thinly sliced
A few slivers white onion (users descretion)
Coarse sea salt
Recipe

step.cmd: Toast bread to desired level of doneness.
Top with refried beans and avocado (mash with a fork for desired consistency).
Add slivered onions, sprinkle with salt, and serve.
